predicate.note: Frames file for 'scrutinize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes 30.2 34 35.4, other framed members include: regard, study; review, study; probably 'examine' should be in there too. Comparison to 'examine'.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: And some investment bankers say a restructuring isn't feasible while the SEC still is scrutinizing Mr. Spiegel's past junk-bond trades.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: Mary scrutinized John's research for signs of obvious plagiarism.
